vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.play (patch_12.sol#78-98):
	External calls:
	- loseWager(msg.sender,wagerAmount) (patch_12.sol#92)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payout(msg.sender,wagerAmount) (patch_12.sol#90)
	- loseWager(msg.sender,wagerAmount) (patch_12.sol#92)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- randomSeed (patch_12.sol#94)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_12.sol#78-98) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_12.sol#111-115):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_12.sol#112)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_12.sol#113)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_12.sol#117-121):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(wagerAmount / 2)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_12.sol#118)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_12.sol#119)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_12.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_12.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_12.sol#111-115):
	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_12.sol#112

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:

	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(wagerAmount / 2)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_12.sol#118
